name: Summer Berry Strawberry Sandwiches
description: Try these for a no-cook dessert when you don’t feel like turning on the oven and baking.
preparation: Beat cream cheese with Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix.
Hull strawberries. Trim hull end to make a flat base, and cut the tips of each berry. Don’t make the tips too small, and save them – you’ll need them later.
Place berries hull side down on a platter so they sit flat. Using the tip of a knife or a small spoon, hollow out berries.
Spoon or pipe cream cheese mixture into hollows, then top with strawberry tips. Drizzle with chocolate syrup and serve.
